attributes.additional_details: Only allow politicians to have 1 wage & only expenses they are allowed to claim is the cheapest rail/bus fair if they reside outside London and no other taxi fairs, and for it to become illegal for politicians to have other incomes directly or indirectly from any company, organisation or individuals. Also for them not to be able to sit on any boards or have any role that might conflict with they're duties as an MP

rejection.details: This is a matetr for the House not for government
